description: Identifier of the work-request notification group (e.g., team or department) this configuration applies to.
Reference to the notification template applied when a work request is received; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
Reference to the notification template applied when a work request converts to a work order; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
Reference to the notification template applied when a work request requires approval; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
Reference to the notification template applied when a work request is denied; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
Reference to the notification template applied when a work request is closed; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
Yes/No flag to send a customer notification when a work request is received.
Yes/No flag to send a customer notification when a work request is converted to a work order.
Yes/No flag to send a customer notification when approval is required on a work request.
Yes/No flag to send a customer notification when a work request is denied.
Yes/No flag to send a customer notification when a work request is closed.
Timestamp when this record was created.
User who last updated this record.
Timestamp when this record was last updated.
Yes/No flag to notify the customer when comments are added on a request (distinct from work requests); confirm with SME.
Yes/No flag to notify the customer when a request is submitted or updated (distinct from work requests); confirm with SME.
Reference to the notification template used when comments are added on a request; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
Reference to the notification template used when a request is submitted or updated; likely a template ID/code; confirm with SME.
